wallDescription: A simple wall of rough hewn stone

gameObjects.name: Rocks
gameObjects.description: Rough and solid stone pillars, formed by erosion, wet and glistening.

gameObjects.name: boat
gameObjects.description: A boat that should allow you to follow the underground river and escape. Thank you for playing the demo of TsenivianEscape!

gameObjects.name: Tranquil spot
gameObjects.description: A tranquil spot, next to what remains of a small fire. You feel confident you can lock the doors to this room and rest here.
